titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Merav Hoffman and Stacy Haponik.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was encoded by Stacy Haponik using a text editor on 30 November 2019 .

did.head: Overview
did.abstract: Harold Stein was an active member of the Filking community. He amassed a large collection of filk songs, zines, convention papers, and audio recordings.
did.physloc: Private residence A different private residence sjb Harold Stein Filk Collection

archdesc.scopecontent: Scope and Content The Harold Stein Filk Collection contains....

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Series I: Conventions Arranged first by convention, then in chronological order. Includes program booklets, promotional materials, schedules, and progress reports.

archdesc.userestrict: Restrictions on Use Most materials within the collection are within copyright. Permission to duplicate these materials is governed by United States copyright law.
archdesc.accessrestrict: Access The collection is open and available for research.

abstract.p: Comic covered APA with a ballot on the back

APA-Filk multi-contributor filk fanzine from 1992. Contributors include John Boardman, Roberta Rogow, Mark L. Blackman, Rennie Levine, Mike Browne, Mordecai Housman. Features a double-sided ad for Concertino I "the Northeast Filk Convention", later NEFilk and the Northeast Floating Filk Convention.
